recipe_name: Coconut and syrup sponge with glazed oranges
author: Lesley Waters
method: Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over a medium heat. Add the sugar, coconut, golden syrup and ginger and heat, stirring continuously, until the sugar has melted. Add the beaten egg and flour and stir well to combine. Grease a microwave-safe bowl with butter and dust with flour. Pour in the sponge batter and cook in a microwave on its highest setting for 4-5 minutes, or until cooked through.  To serve, turn out the sponge onto a serving plate. Decorate with slices of orange and mint sprigs, pour the honey over and finish with a drizzle of cream.
